item.title: US-101 South - Exit 685
item.description: US-101 south at Exit 685 - CA-36

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 649
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 649 - CA-36/Antelope Blvd./To CA-99/Chico. This used to be the northern terminus of CA-99, but it was moved east of here to the CA-36 junction a few years back.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-99
item.description: CA-36 East at CA-99. Turn left to continue east on CA-36. Continue straight ahead for CA-99.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-99
item.description: CA-36 east at CA-99. Use CA-36 east for Lassen National Park and Susanville. Continue south on CA-99 for Chico.

item.title: CA-36 East at CA-99
item.description: CA-36 east approaching CA-99. Turn left at junction (CA-36) for Lassen National Park and Susanville.

item.title: CA-36 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-36 east to Lassen Park and Susanville, via CA-36. Distance to Chico via CA-99.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 649 Offramp
item.description: I-5 south on Exit 649 offramp (CA-36). Turn left on CA-36 east for Chico (via CA-99), Lassen National Park, and Susanville. Turn right on CA-36 west for Central Red Bluff.

item.title: I-5 South - Exit 649
item.description: I-5 south at Exit 649 - CA-36/Central Red Bluff/Antelope Blvd./To CA-99/Chico. This used to be the northern terminus of CA-99, but it was moved east of here to the CA-36 junction a few years back.

item.title: US-101 South Approaching CA-36
item.description: US-101 south approaching CA-36 east. This intersection was being upgraded to an interchange when this photo was taken.

item.description: US-101 south atCA-36 east to Hydesville and Bridgeville.

item.description: US-101 south approaching CA-36 east.

item.description: CA-36 east approaching Fredoyner Pass.

item.description: Approaching CA-44 to Redding and Mt. Shasta on CA-36 east, in Lassen County.

item.description: CA-36 at eastern end of CA-44 to Redding and Mt. Shasta.

item.title: US-101 North at CA-36
item.description: US-101 north at western end of CA-36.

item.description: Distance marker on CA-36 east to Susanville and Reno in Lassen County.

item.title: CA-36 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on CA-36 east to Westwood, Susanville, and Reno in Lassen County.

item.description: CA-36 east approaching CA-139 north to Klamath Falls and Adin in Susanville.

item.description: Northern end of CA-147 north at CA-36 junction near Westwood.

item.description: End of CA-36 east at US-395 to Alturas and Reno in Johnsonville.
